For details see accompanying license terms. */

/** * An entry field that can be used to edit a {@code Double} attribute of a * {@code Figure}. *

* The {@code JDoubleAttributeField} can either be global to all * {@code DrawingView}s of a {@code DrawingEditor}, or it can be local to a * single {@code DrawingView}. *

* In both cases, the drawing editor must be basicSet using method {@code setEditor}. * To make the entry field local to a single {@code DrawingView}, the view must * be basicSet using method {@code setView}. * * FIXME We have got many kinds of attribute fields. Factor out all reusable * code. * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 1.0 April 22, 2007 Created. */
